sanskrit_verse:
आचम्यौदक्परावृत्य त्रिरायम्य शनैरसून् ।
षडृतूंश्च नमस्कुर्यात्पितॄनेव च मन्त्रवत् ॥ ३.२१७॥
transliteration:
ācamyaudakaparāvṛtya trirāyamya śanairasūn |
ṣaḍṛtūṃśca namaskuryātpitṝneva ca mant ravat ||
sph_interpretive_translation: One shall face away from water, sip water thrice while chanting sacred utterances, then slowly offer salutations to the six seasons and to the ancestors as to deities.
